flawed_nl_solution:
He estimates the building on the left is 80 feet tall because 100 x 0.8 = <<100*0.8=80>>80
The combined height of the left and middle is 108 because 100 + 80 = <<100+80=108>>108
The building on the right he estimates as 88 feet because 108 - 20 = <<108-20=88>>88
He estimates the combined height as 268 feet because 80 + 100 + 88 = <<80+100+88=268>>268
#### 268

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
